channel.title: Wrestling on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Wrestling on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: How To Make A Wrestler Mad
item.description: Hey all, Ernie at Tedium here with a fresh piece from Andrew Egan, who decided to cover a topic that Tedium has never covered before. Anyway, while I go work out my wrestling persona, read on â€¦ Today in Tedium: Have you ever endured the specific torture of listening to a diehard fan explain their love of whatever it is they love? If you happen to share the same passion, you just made a new friend.
